wikipedia_page.main: Dave Buxton (born 2 April 1952) is an English jazz pianist and composer.  He currently plays in his band, the Dave Buxton Trio.  Between 1986 and 1990, he performed with and wrote for Andy Sheppard.

response: * 2 – Dave Buxton, English pianist and composer.
